Ketorolac

Mechanism of Action

Non-selective COX inhibitor see NSAIDNSAID
Mechanism of Action
Inhibit COX enzyme which prevents prostaglandins from being formed (which are inflammatory mediators) 1

COX 1
maintain normal renal function, GI tract mucosal protection, throm... 1

Pharmacology

Half-life 2.5-8.5 hrs 1 Metabolised by conjugation

Indications

Pain Management#Step 1 - Non-opioids +/- Adjuvants Private or Broken Links

Dosage

15-30 mg IV/IM q6-24 hrs
